alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 10 at 11:41AM MST until March 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Central Highlands, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 AM MST Saturday. For the High Wind Watch, from late tonight through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
